name: KPMG Advisory
tagline: Fastest-growing Big Four firm with multi-disciplinary advisory services
description: KPMG is one of the world's leading professional services firms and the fastest growing Big Four accounting firm in the United States. With 90+ offices and more than 36,000 employees and partners throughout the US, we're leading the industry in new and exciting ways. Our size and strength make us much more agile and responsive to changing trends.
known_for: First of the Big Four firms to organize along industry lines matching clients. Ranked #1 for quality of work in risk consulting by Source. Known for technology-enabled transformation and multi-disciplinary approach combining audit, tax, and advisory expertise.
career_path: Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Associate (2-3 yrs) → Senior Associate (2-3 yrs) → Manager (2-3 yrs) → Senior Manager (2 yrs) → Director (3-4 yrs) → Managing Director/Partner

recruiting.process: Application → First Round (1 case + 1 behavioral, 30 min each) → Final Round (1 case + 1 behavioral + 1 written case, 30-60 min each)
recruiting.unique: Written case in final round. Behavioral interviews weighted more heavily than at other Big 4 firms. Strong emphasis on cultural fit and understanding KPMG values.
recruiting.timeline: Applications open September, first rounds October-November, offers typically within 2 days of final round with written offers in 10 days

byu.tip: KPMG actively recruits from BYU and has a solid alumni network. Emphasize cultural fit and values alignment in behavioral interviews, which carry more weight than at other firms.
